plot outline: After death of their parents, Bijay and his Sister want go to Kolkata for a job. One day Bijay saves Mr. Dev's life from an accident and Mr. Dev gave them shelter. After death of Mr. Dev, Bijay takes the responsibilities of "Dev Industries" and their family. Janardan is a corrupt staff of Dev Industries and he wants to take revenge because he was sacked for his shady practices. Bijay loves Nandini who is coma and he fights back Janardan to hold the family together.
title: Sangharsha
